thread.title: Among Those Advising Obama On His Future Plans: Eva Longoria, Report Says
thread.title_full: Among Those Advising Obama On His Future Plans: Eva Longoria, Report Says

author: Tanisha Ramirez
title: Among Those Advising Obama On His Future Plans: Eva Longoria, Report Says
text:
Among Those Advising Obama On His Future Plans: Eva Longoria, Report Says Fox News Latino Posted: 08/18/2015 06:01 PM EDT Vincent Sandoval via Getty Images 
Actress Eva Longoria is offering her advice to President Barack Obama on what he should do after leaving office in January 2017. 
According to the New York Times , the Mexican-American actress is part of a select group of high-profile people who are advising the president during midnight meetings at the White House.
